reviews.text: Tasty Indian food. Highly recommend this place if you want delicious indian food. Just a feedback but the butter chicken should have boned pieces and not boneless pieces. I wish the biryani did not take 45 mins or else I would have ordered it. The owner is a friendly man who is usually around. There’s a shop at the restaurant too and proceeds from it go to a foundation in Assam, India. Truly lovely place. Simple but traditional interiors and a must visit for those who want Indian food in Liechtenstein. Side note- the naan bread and the mango lassi for 10/10

Our favourite Indian buffet in Europe. The food is prepared fresh and tastes like home with no overdose of cream and oil. The owners and chefs are Indians and it shows in the quality of the food. A lot of Indian tour operators stop here. Enough said.
Indian restaurant with an Indian heart, good tasty food with authentic Indian masala.  Good ambience, with a small temple. Courteous hotel owner.
The service was very welcoming, and the buffet was both delicious and fresh. Highly recommended and affordable too.
Very friendly owner/chef/and also a good waiter.. Realty great food. Feel like eating at home. And the restaurant is so big and well decorated. Really a great experience.. Thank you
